title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student to secure his family's future.

title: Planet Earth II
description: David Attenborough returns in this documentary series about animal habitats around the world, featuring stunning visuals of wildlife.

title: Planet Earth
description: Emmy Award-winning, 11 episodes, five years in the making, the most expensive nature documentary series ever commissioned.

title: Band of Brothers
description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to VJ Day.

title: Chernobyl
description: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in Ukraine becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

title: The Wire
description: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
description: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar.

title: The Sopranos
description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state.

title: Blue Planet II
description: David Attenborough returns to the world's oceans in this sequel to the acclaimed documentary Blue Planet.

title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
description: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.

title: Cosmos
description: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: Our Planet
description: This groundbreaking series explores how climate change impacts all living creatures and the planet.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

title: Bluey
description: The slice-of-life adventures of a six-year-old Blue Heeler pup, Bluey, who lives with her dad, mum, and four-year-old sister, Bingo.

title: The World at War
description: A documentary series chronicling the events of World War II through archival footage and interviews with key figures.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

title: Attack on Titan
description: After his hometown is destroyed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

title: Life
description: David Attenborough's legendary BBC series about natural history, exploring the struggle for survival in the animal world.

title: The Last Dance
description: A ten-part documentary chronicling the untold story of Michael Jordan and the Chicago Bulls dynasty.

title: The Twilight Zone
description: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable way.

title: The Vietnam War
description: An immersive documentary series from Ken Burns and Lynn Novick about one of the most consequential and divisive events in American history.

title: Rick and Morty
description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

title: Sherlock
description: A modern update of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mystery series, relocating Sherlock Holmes and John Watson to 21st century London.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
description: The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City with occasional help from Robin and Batgirl.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years before his fateful run-in with Walter White.

title: Arcane
description: Set in Utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League of Legends champions.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

title: The Blue Planet
description: David Attenborough presents a natural history of the oceans, exploring the diversity of life in the world's seas.

title: Clarkson's Farm
description: Jeremy Clarkson attempts to run a farm in the English countryside, with chaotic and comedic results.

title: Dexter: Resurrection
description: Dexter Morgan returns in this revival series, continuing the story of the vigilante serial killer.

title: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
description: The rise and fall of stockbroker Harshad Mehta, who orchestrated one of India's largest securities scams in 1992.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father.

title: Frozen Planet
description: David Attenborough explores the wildlife and landscape of the Arctic and Antarctic in this BBC nature documentary series.

title: Human Planet
description: A documentary series exploring how humans have adapted to life in every environment on Earth.

title: Only Fools and Horses
description: Two brothers from London's rough Peckham estate chase get-rich-quick schemes and dodgy deals in this beloved British sitcom.

title: The Civil War
description: Ken Burns' landmark documentary series chronicling the American Civil War through archival photos, music, and firsthand accounts.

title: Firefly
description: Five hundred years in the future, a renegade crew aboard a small spacecraft navigate the outer reaches of the galaxy.

title: As If
description: A British teen drama following a group of friends navigating life, love, and adolescence in London.

title: Death Note
description: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

title: Gravity Falls
description: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel spend the summer with their great-uncle in the mysterious town of Gravity Falls, where strange things abound.

title: The Pitt
description: A medical drama following the lives of doctors, nurses, and staff at a modern-day hospital.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
description: An elf and her friends defeat a demon king in a great war. But the war is over, and the elf must search for a new way of life.

title: Seinfeld
description: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic friends.

title: Dekalog
description: Krzysztof Kie≈õlowski's ten-part series of moral tales, each loosely based on one of the Ten Commandments.

title: The Beatles: Get Back
description: Peter Jackson's documentary chronicling the making of the Beatles' Let It Be album and their final live performance.

title: Taskmaster
description: Comedians compete in bizarre tasks set by the Taskmaster, with Greg Davies judging and Alex Horne assisting.

title: Nathan for You
description: Nathan Fielder uses his business degree to help struggling businesses with elaborate, often absurd marketing schemes.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

title: True Detective
description: Police detectives navigate a series of high-profile cases while managing their personal and professional lives.

title: Fargo
description: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue, and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. All of these tales mysteriously lead back to Fargo.

title: Apocalypse: The Second World War
description: A French documentary series recounting World War II using restored and colorized archival footage.

title: Persona
description: A drama exploring identity, secrets, and the masks people wear.

title: Africa
description: David Attenborough's BBC series exploring the wildlife and diverse ecosystems of the African continent.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on an adventure with his pirate crew in hopes of finding the greatest treasure ever, known as the One Piece.

title: When They See Us
description: Ava DuVernay's limited series about the wrongful conviction of the Central Park Five.

title: The West Wing
description: Behind the scenes of the fictional Bartlett administration as it navigates political and personal challenges.

title: Friends
description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
description: Five selfish friends run a struggling Irish bar in Philadelphia and get into absurd schemes and misadventures.

title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
description: John Oliver offers a satirical look at the week in news, politics, and current events.

title: TVF Pitchers
description: Indian web series following four friends who quit their jobs to start their own tech startup.
